results.title: The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: To evaluate and compare the effects of the combined intervention of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and exercise on the @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone degeneration@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ model of @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@OP@@@) induced by @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogen deficiency@@@.

citations.NLM: Li H, Gou Y, Tian F, Lian Q, Hu Y, Zhang L. The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet. Exp Gerontol. 2022 Jul;164():111794. PMID: 35421557
citations.BibTeX: @article{35421557, title={The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.}, author={Li H and Gou Y and Tian F and Lian Q and Hu Y and Zhang L}, journal={Exp Gerontol}, volume={164}, pages={111794}}

results.title: Simvastatin mitigates depressive-like behavior in ovariectomized rats: Possible role of NLRP3 inflammasome and estrogen receptors' modulation.
results.text_hl: Moreover, many reports highlighted that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ has @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogenic@@@ activity and was able to induce the expression of estrogen receptors in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Menze ET, Ezzat H, Shawky S, Sami M, Selim EH, Ahmed S, Maged N, Nadeem N, Eldash S, Michel HE. Simvastatin mitigates depressive-like behavior in ovariectomized rats: Possible role of NLRP3 inflammasome and estrogen receptors' modulation. Int Immunopharmacol. 2021 Jun;95():107582. PMID: 33774267
citations.BibTeX: @article{33774267, title={Simvastatin mitigates depressive-like behavior in ovariectomized rats: Possible role of NLRP3 inflammasome and estrogen receptors' modulation.}, author={Menze ET and Ezzat H and Shawky S and Sami M and Selim EH and Ahmed S and Maged N and Nadeem N and Eldash S and Michel HE}, journal={Int Immunopharmacol}, volume={95}, pages={107582}}

results.title: Simvastatin induces estrogen receptor-alpha expression in bone, restores bone loss, and decreases ERalpha expression and uterine wet weight in ovariectomized rats.
results.text_hl: Uterine wet weight, bone mineral density (BMD) of lumbar vertebrae, biomechanics of lumbar vertebrae, and induction of @GENE_ESR1 @GENE_24890 @@@ERalpha@@@ expression in the bone and uterus were analyzed. The 6-week @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment improved lumbar vertebral BMD and boosted biomechanical performance of the vertebral body compared to the OVX control, suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can treat @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@osteoporosis@@@ caused by @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogen deficiency@@@.

citations.NLM: Li X, Song QS, Wang JY, Leng HJ, Chen ZQ, Liu ZJ, Dang GT, Song CL. Simvastatin induces estrogen receptor-alpha expression in bone, restores bone loss, and decreases ERalpha expression and uterine wet weight in ovariectomized rats. J Bone Miner Metab. 2011 Jul;29(4):396-403. PMID: 21063740
